document_description:
This Act repeals and replaces the Seychelles Energy Commission Act 2010, and notably makes provisions for renewable energy and energy efficiency. The Commission is notably in charge of designing tariffs that are favourable to renewable energy sources, and foster public awareness about the importance of renewable energy in all sectors.

Part VI of the document is focused on the means of promotion of renewable energy. Energy efficiency is also promoted in all sectors, notably in Parts VII and VIII.
